entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `IPNetwork` get-only property to `UnicastIPAddressInformation` #100213
  • Possible DEREF_AFTER_NULL.EX at src/coreclr/vm/eepolicy.cpp #100212
  • Possible DEREF_AFTER_NULL.EX at src/coreclr/vm/eepolicy.cpp #100210
  • DEREF_OF_NULL.EX at runtime/src/coreclr/vm/zapsig.cpp #100209
  • DEREF_AFTER_NULL.EX in src/coreclr/vm/readytoruninfo.cpp #100208
  • C4242 error when compiling CoreCLR on Windows with -msbuild #100207
  • Net 6 httpclient 401 large requests #100200
  • EventLogRecord.TaskDisplayName throws System.AccessViolationException and termintates the program #100198

Closed

  • C++/CLI x86 marshalling misses copy ctor/dtor calls resulting in C++ STL iterator debugging breaking #100033
  • Convert.ChangeType(infinity, float/double) throws an error on Linux in .NET 6/7/8 #100197
  • Question on Retrieving and Copying Method Instructions by Start Address in C# #100202
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Windows stress builds are broken #95750
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0 MAUI App has exited with code 2147943792 (0x80070570) #99465
  • xcode-select : error : tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode - new error with nativeaot in .NET 9 preview 2 #100189

PullRequests

Created

  • Use number of slots intead of size in BuildBlockStore #100206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `GT_MKREFANY` #100204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Remove unused assembly files #100201
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use clang --version to get Apple toolset version #100199
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.58, windows: 123.0.6312.58 #100196
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Cache more info on HttpMethod #100177
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Remove state machine allocation from HttpConnection.ReadAsync #100205
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100050
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Constructor comment fix (this is class SHA3_512) #99860
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Workaround image bug in 1es-windows-2022-open #100145
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Move a few allocations behind IsHttp3Supported checks #100178
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Use clang --version to get Apple toolset version #100190
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • Update CodeAnalysis config to include recently-added rules #100146
    area-Meta
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    NO-REVIEW, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Revert #99140 #100147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix RhGetCurrentThunkContext/RhCommonStub on linux-bionic-arm #100192
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • https error when using webapi with sdk dotnet 8.0.203 on a mac Sonoma 14.4 (x64) #39729

Closed

  • Segmentation fault during `dotnet restore` on ARM64v8 .NET 8 docker image #39724

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad IDE0028 suggestion #72701
  • IDE0028/IDE0090/IDE00300/IDE0305 do not catch some expressions #72699

Closed

  • After upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspace from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 it started throwing at runtime #63921
    17.6 P3
  • Type comparison may not work properly for metadata types #72692
  • Quick actions and refactoring - generate exception class creates obsolete code #72552
  • Move type code fix results in compile error with primary constructors #72632
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused portions of the legacy diagnostic service. #72702
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove 'IDiagnosticUpdateSource' interface #72661
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use raw strings in test code #72691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not generate obsolete `Exception` constructor #72671
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove legacy IDiagnosticService #72660
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove primary ctor when moving a type. #72695
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix exception for non-cs/vb document #72677
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide all possible keywords in xml doc comment `langword` tag #72694
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [VB] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants, or whose embedded expressions are only string as optimized as `&` operator or C# (pre 10.0) #72611
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scroller view for window is too thin make much bigger #21414
  • Memory issue #21413

Closed

  • Multi-Project App template misses out on defining the Style named Headline and Subheadline, thus resulting in an App crash on launch #21190
    .NET 8 SR3

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed border inside frame not rendering #20974
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Replace our internal usage analyzer with .NET 8.0 [Experimental] #33384
  • Query/AOT: fix remaining AOT materializer exceptions #33383

Closed

  • All primary keys altered in migration after upgrading to 8.0.1 #33372

PullRequests

Created

  • API review changes #33388
  • Make Cosmos provider throw for sync I/O #33386
  • Sunday cleanup project: replace internal usage analyzer with [Experimental] #33385

Merged

  • Fix NRT directives in tests #33387

Updated

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • Precompiled query inner loop source generator #33350
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
